> The idea with the first rtrace command is to render the polygon by 
> itself.  You don't need a fore (or aft) clipping plane simply because 
> there is *nothing* else in the scene to render.  (You'll even get a 
> warning about no light sources unless you add a -w option to rtrace, 
> which I forgot.)


...but there's no point rendering it by itself - I need it to take into 
account windows, walls, doors, etc.


Chris
